welcome_description: Please select your role to continue.
language_selector_description: Select your preferred language to personalize your experience.
language_updated_toast_description: The app language has been set to {languageName}.
welcome_header_subtitle: Ready to take a step on your mindful path today?
onboarding_gender_description: This helps us connect you with relevant peers.
onboarding_marital_description: This allows for more relatable conversations.
onboarding_privacy_description: Your choice determines how you connect with support.
privacy_public_description_general: Connect anonymously with peers of similar gender and marital status.
privacy_private_description: Receive confidential support from the EmpathiCare AI chatbot.
peer_support_description: Connect with others, share experiences, and find support in a safe community.
